properties.media:imagetext:
Introducing
Flight
Pay For
Passengers.
With our Hopscotch ™ Fare, we
charge you a lot less money for spend-
ing a little more time with us.
This fare is valid on your Piedmont
flight that makes one or more stops,
or a connection, in selected markets.
Save 50% round trip.
*
If you fly one way, we take 30% off.
So, either way, you get good flight
pay. Call your travel agent or us for
details on how you can get our
Hopscotch™ Fare. But do it soon.
Witha deal this good, seats are limited.
Piedmonts
50%-Off Fares
*Round-trip service not always available.
All fares subject to change without notice.
FREQUENCY
1—Monday
5—Friday
2—Tuesday
6 Saturday
3 Wednesday
7—Sunday
4-Thursday
X—Except

All schedules in local time. Schedules subject to change without notice. For
additional schedule information call us.

APRIL 1, 1981
PIEDMONT
AIRLINES
QUICK REFERENCE SCHEDULE
CHICAGO
For reservations and information in Chicago,
call 263-3656.
For Air Cargo, call 686-4690.
New round-trip direct service to Kinston.
Fly our convenient nonstops to Charlotte,
Greensboro, and Richmond.
